posts.post_content:
A couple of lower grade T201's for sale. Great to help build a set.

Graham/Mattern - sold to me as NM five years ago. When it arrived, it was obviously trimmed. Great eye appeal, none the less. $15

Gaspur/Clarke - hmmm. Gaspur's registration is a bit off and a couple of creases on the lower half. I'd give it a Good.  $20

Dougherty/Lord - the short print. 1/2" separation in fold and light vertical crease. Great eye appeal and the separation cannot be seen (it's in a lucite holder). $30

$3.00 s/h

Here's another - T201. A beautiful SGC graded card, it actually looks better than the VG3 card that I replaced it with. But....if you look at the bottom there is a small punch out of it and two small staple holes at the top. $ 30.00 + s/h ($ 3.00).
Hickman/Hinchman coming next. Fair to good. $20
